room_title: Escape room "The Wizard’s Lair" by Southernmost Escape in Key West
room_address: 2782 N Roosevelt Blvd. Key West, FL 33040
room_description: The evil wizard, Aragog, has placed a curse on our village for the wrongful death of his beloved, the beautiful witch Aurora. You must sneak into the wizard’s lair, find and execute the spell to break the curse, and escape before Aragog returns in 1 hour. Can you and your brave group of warriors save our village?
